entry.title: [GRA04][Infrastructure] - Multiple racks maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 31, 06:00 UTC  -  Apr 1, 14:00 UTC

Jan 28, 05:19 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, we will be carrying out a maintenance on our electrical infrastructure.

Start time : 31/03/2026 06:00 UTC
End time : 01/04/2026 14:00 UTC
Service impact : 31/03/2026 ,servers in racks GRA0404B04A,GRA0404B04B,GRA0404B04C,GRA0404B04D ,GRA0404C04A,GRA0404C04B,GRA0404C04C,GRA0404C04D will be temporarily unavailable during the maintenance for 30 min.
01/04/2026, servers in racks GRA0404D04A,GRA0404D04B,GRA0404D04C,GRA0404D04D,GRA0404E04A,GRA0404E04B,GRA0404E04C,GRA0404E04D,GRA0406A04A will be temporarily unavailable during the maintenance for 30 min.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our electrical infrastructure for rack R709B10.

Thank you for your understanding.
